content: We need a compelling metric for our YC pitch.
Show week-over-week retention hitting 75 percent - elite for consumer apps.
Retention climbed after we added personalised jokes.
Note that feature in the slide: 'Humor engine -> +18 pp retention'.
Highlight 45 k MAU with 12 k daily creators; both doubled post-personalisation.
Show CAC dropped to $1.12 after our TikTok funnel; payback under two weeks.
We hit k = 1.4 in June; anything above 1.3 signals organic flywheel.
Should I mention the Series-A soft circle?
Yes - $4 M soft-committed from XYZ Capital validates traction.
